knimeNode.name: Tika Language Detector
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node detects the language of a given String/Document value.

fullDescription.intro: This node uses the Apache Tika library to detect the language of a given String/Document value. The newly detected languages will be appended to the input table. The list of all supported languages can be seen here . If the text contains mixed languages, the detector will, by default, return the language with the most confidence value.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the strings or documents to parse.
The name of the appended column for the languages. Can be left empty.
Specify whether the confidence value of each detected language should be appended in a new column.
The name of the appended column for the confidence value column. Can be left empty.
Specify whether all detected languages should be shown in the output table as a collection list. This is important for the case where the text might contain mixed languages.

ports.inPort: The input table containing the strings/documents to convert. The input table has to contain at least one String/Document column.

outPort.name: Table with appended language and confidence value column

ports.outPort: The output table containing the detected languages and if chosen, the confidence value of each detected language.
